cu.explanation_en: Setting the NG-AMF interface IP address to an unreachable subnet '10.0.0.1' will cause routing failures, preventing the CU from establishing NG connection to the AMF.

du.explanation_en: Setting the remote N address to an unreachable IP '10.0.0.1' will cause routing failures, preventing the DU from establishing F1 connection to the CU.
du.explanation_zh: 將遠端 N 地址設定為無法到達的 IP '10.0.0.1' 會導致路由失敗，防止 DU 與 CU 建立 F1 連接。
